description: Upgrade all 11 CopywriterOS agents to Hormozi-level quality with full frameworks, communication DNA, signature phrases, and objection algorithms

userStories.title: Upgrade Dan Kennedy Agent
userStories.description: As a CopywriterOS user, I want Dan Kennedy agent to be super complete, so that I get authentic No B.S. style copy with all his frameworks
acceptanceCriteria: Read existing mind data from outputs/minds/dan_kennedy/
Add missing operational_frameworks (Magnetic Marketing, No B.S. Time Management, etc.)
Add 30-50 signature phrases organized by tier
Output matches Kennedy's direct, no-nonsense style
userStories.notes: Almost complete at 1484 lines. Has mind available. Focus on filling gaps.

userStories.title: Upgrade Eugene Schwartz Agent

acceptanceCriteria: Read existing mind data from outputs/minds/eugene_schwartz/
Add 30-50 signature phrases from Breakthrough Advertising
userStories.notes: Has mind available. Major frameworks: Awareness Levels, Sophistication, Mass Desire.
